idinfo.useconst: None provided credit is given to the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission (PFBC) as long as the data is in its original unaltered state. If modifications are made to the data set, users are obligated to describe the types of modifications they have made. Users are not to misrepresent PFBC data sets, nor to imply that changes they (users) have made were approved by the PFBC.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

procstep.procdesc: The data set was created by geocoding the hatchery addresses and then verifying the locations with aerial photography. The photography used was PA Map imagery where available and National Agricultural Imagery Program 2004 Color Infrared imagery in other areas.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: PFBC Bureau of Law Enforcement Region where hatchery is located
Whether a Visitor Center is present at the facility
Whether trout are raised at the hatchery
Whether warmwater/coolwater species are raised at the hatchery
Web page link containing more information about the County the hatchery is within
Whether steelhead/salmon are raised at the hatchery

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

The FILES and documentation are provided "as is" and the USER assumes the entire risk as to its quality and performance.
